content:
The Zulip team takes no VC funding, builds an incredible open-source tool, and makes free hosting available to FHIR and many, many other communities. They just announced a public sponsorship option to support their open-source development. I'm sponsoring Zulip for its amazing threaded chats, free hosting for projects like chat.fhir.org, and welcoming open source community.

If you want to join me in sponsorship:

https://github.com/sponsors/zulip
Thanks for the heads up, I've joined too.

Thank you for the info!

Looking into this for DCG/Alphora.
